title: Satellite Re-tasking for Imagery
description: An analyst needs to urgently re-task an imaging satellite to capture pictures of a suspected new military construction site.

tasks.description: Submit a new collection request with the target coordinates and required image resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst accurately fills out and submits the collection request form.

tasks.description: Check for available satellite passes over the target area in the next 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a suitable satellite pass occurring in 3 hours.

tasks.description: Task the satellite to take the image during the identified pass.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully sends the collection command to the satellite operations center.
